annonstext:
Expleo Technology Nordic (former Engineering Partner AB (EP) was founded in 2007 and has since been one of the fastest growing and most reputable consultant company in the west coast of Sweden mainly inte the Automotive industry. We have all the frame agreements in Engineering, IT and Purchasing/Logistics for all our client. Success concept is based on a personal and responsive relationship with our employees- and customers, as well as a flexible and dynamic organization. We are a partof a global organization called Expleo Group with 15 000 employees and are present in 25 countries. Locally, we are a relatively small company, 200 engineers, with a family atmosphere and where you as an individual can be recognized. We offer an exciting and challenging career with lots of opportunities.

We are looking for someone who is delivery focused, proactive and able to work under rapidly changing conditions. You should have a positive and “get it done” attitude.

-you have to have experience from working with cloud AWS

-You have worked using Agile methodologies (SAFe, Scrum)

-Fluent English skills, in both speech and Writing

-You are a team player and enjoy working in a global environment

-You have experience working as an IT Architect preferably in the Telecom or Automotive industry.

 Skills required: AWS, Azure, Software / Integration / Windows, Integration / Integration methods/framework

 Do you enjoy working in a global environment in a high-tech and fast-phased industry? Then you might be the one we are looking for. We are currently looing for an Application Software Architect for our customer in the Automotive industry.

Job description; Participate in critical and/or strategic projects as well as prioritized projects. Lead competence networks and communities both locally and globally as well as contribute to the IT methodology area and knowledge sharing. Design IT solutions and make strategic technology choices, directly supervising the quality of designs and implementation inside and between components.

 As part of the integration track of IT strategic priority our customer is introducing new integration platforms and services and need an experienced architect who can help the organization to start proof of technology and implement first pilots on this platforms and cloud services.

The platforms and cloud services being worked on are:

-AWS

 - IBM API 

 - IBM MQ (in the azure cloud)

 - Microsoft Azure Logic apps

 - Microsoft Azure service bus

 - Microsoft on-premise data gateway

-MQ/Azure service bus gateway

We are looking for someone who is delivery focused, proactive and able to work under rapidly changing conditions. You should have a positive and “get it done” attitude.

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
